title: cmd/8g: out of fixed registers
body:

Program is:
http://play.golang.org/p/QUO0TkWevZ

$ GOARCH=386 go build src.go
registers allocated at

	CX	0
	DX	0

	SP	0
	BP	0x4ca962
	SI	0x4cd431
	DI	0x4cffab
src.go:31: out of fixed registers
